H0.text: Weimaraner ('vymaraana') pointer/gun dogs are typically distinctively. Brown

H1.text: Weimaraner ('vymaraana') pointer/gun dogs are typically distinctively. Black

H2.text: Weimaraner ('vymaraana') pointer/gun dogs are typically distinctively. White

H3.text: Weimaraner ('vymaraana') pointer/gun dogs are typically distinctively. Grey/gray

A4.text: The coat may be mouse-grey, roe-grey or silver-grey in various shades, or of a colour intermediate between these

A5.text: minor white markings to the feet and chest are tolerated
